message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $100.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more like $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more like $90.
I'm not willing to go that low, but I can meet you at $95. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still thinking $90 is a fair price for the product.
I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle, but I'm willing to compromise at $98. It's still a good deal for you, and I think you'll really appreciate the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still thinking $96 is the best I can do.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you at $99, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still not comfortable with $99. I'm willing to meet you at $95, but that's my final offer.
